posts.post_content:
This card entered my collection many years ago via a board member. Now it is time for it to move on to someone else. 

Sam is still looking quite well after all these years. I imagine he could be classified as VG-ish with a very nice image for an Old Judge. See images below to help you form an opinion on condition. PM or post in thread with any questions or requests.

Price is $OLD

PayPal FF preferred. If PayPal G&S add $50. Shipping and insurance is included.
